long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Gmail Declutter: Simplify Your Inbox Today!

Are you overwhelmed by a cluttered Gmail inbox? Introducing the Gmail Declutter extension, your ultimate solution for reclaiming control over your email!

What It Does: Gmail Declutter empowers you to efficiently manage your inbox by providing powerful tools to filter, search, and delete emails based on your specific criteria. Whether you want to remove promotional emails, clear out old messages, or simply tidy up your inbox, this extension makes it easy.

Key Features:

Advanced Filtering: Use our intuitive filtering options to find emails by date, keywords, labels, and message status (read/unread).
Batch Deletion: Delete multiple emails at once with just a few clicks, saving you time and effort.
Auto-Delete Scheduling: Set up automatic clean-ups at your convenience to keep your inbox organized without any hassle.
Custom Labeling: Choose specific labels to filter your emails for precise deletion.
Why You Should Install It: With Gmail Declutter, you can streamline your email management, reduce stress, and enhance productivity. Say goodbye to distractions and hello to a more organized and efficient inbox. Ideal for busy professionals, students, and anyone looking to take control of their email experience, this extension will help you:

Save Time: Quickly eliminate unwanted emails and focus on what matters most.
Reduce Stress: A clean inbox leads to a clearer mind. Enjoy the peace of mind that comes with organization.
Enhance Productivity: Spend less time searching for important emails and more time on what truly matters.
Join thousands of satisfied users who have transformed their Gmail experience! Download Gmail Declutter now and take the first step towards an organized inbox!
